title: plz help me with this 004

embed.description: Store photos and docs online. Access them from any PC, Mac or phone. Create and work together on Word, Excel or PowerPoint documents.

body: as you can tell i can play fine tell internet goes out for about 1 or 2 min then it does this it was 003 now its 004

replies.body: ty run a fix on hard drive and i think it fix it
i run it in Administrator it has never done this b4

It looks like your client is trying to run a repatch after noticing some corrupted or missing files, but once it starts scanning it realizes it doesn't have access to those files. Those 004 errors are also a really good sign that your OS isn't giving admin rights to League so it can run correctly. Update your admin settings for League following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and that should get you going again!
